name: Duo (itch) (PTB10)
description:
Welcome to Duo!

A minimal puzzle platformer, where everything happens twice. If you move one player, you move the other. Get them both to their goals to win!

  • 60 carefully made levels, with plenty of mechanics to keep things fresh
  • Player customisation - complete challenges to unlock 16 unique skins
  • A beautiful ambient soundtrack
  • Extra content when you finish the game, including a dedicated speedrun mode and 3 hidden bonus levels
100% Free

As my first game, it felt right to make Duo available to everyone, for free! To support my future work, please consider donating or purchasing the soundtrack if you enjoy the game!

Join the Community

Want to talk about the game with other players? Have an issue, or got stuck on a puzzle? We're here to help! Just hop over to the Duo Discord server.

You can also get in touch with us at contact.duogame@gmail.com, or report an issue by filling out this form.

Disclaimer

Duo is optimised for devices with a screen resolution of 16:9. If your screen has a different resolution, you may notice that some scenes in the game don't look as pretty as they should. If this bothers you, please disable fullscreen from the settings menu - this will lock the game's resolution to 16:9.
